title: Possible Annie Arcane Comet Combo Bug?

embed.description: It seems that Tibbers DOT triggers arcane comet for each tick. Unsure.

body: It appears that Tibbers causes arcane comet to trigger every tick. In this case, if damage report is correct, I took 2.7k damage from arcane comet. This may be limited to URF? I'm unsure.

replies.body: Also saw this in urf. It's... kinda funny. https://plays.tv/video/5a407059e0ced58b75/arcane-comet-bug
